metadata.title: CVE-2016-7075 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that Kubernetes as used by Openshift Enterprise 3 did notcorrectly validate X.509 client intermediate certificate host name fields.An attacker could use this flaw to bypass authentication requirements byusing a specially crafted X.509 certificate.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
